thread.title: Sugar & Spyked to Host Divinity Fluff Tasting at Bar 20
thread.title_full: Sugar & Spyked to Host Divinity Fluff Tasting at Bar 20

author: prbuzz.com
title: Sugar & Spyked to Host Divinity Fluff Tasting at Bar 20
text:
Los Angeles, CA – Sugar & Spyked, a dessert bar company specializing in alcohol-infused treats, announced today the launch of Divinity Fluff, a decadent variety of gourmet marshmallows infused with top shelf spirits and wine and flavor enhanced with natural fruit and real chocolate. The marshmallows are a fun, new way to satisfy a sweet tooth, yet easy on the love handles.
To celebrate the launch, Sugar & Spyked will host an invitation-only VIP tasting at Bar 20, located inside the Grafton Hotel. Guests will have an opportunity to help the company’s founders choose the most popular flavors to hit the production floor in time for the Thanksgiving holiday weekend. Flavors include Chocolate Bacon Bourbon, Moscow Mule and Pink Moscato. Non-alcoholic flavors are also available.
The Divinity Fluff tasting will be held on November 3 from 6:00 p.m. until 10:00 p.m. The event will also include hors d'oeuvres prepared by Oliver’s Prime, complimentary mini massage by Royal Treatment Pampering Concierge Services and specialty drinks to order by the Bar 20 mixologist.
For more information and to R.S.V.P. for the event, contact Tamara Anderson at This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
